GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
netfilter: nf_tables: do not allow SET_ID to refer to another table

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 1a4b18b1ff11ba26f9a852019d674fde9d1d1cff, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 958bee14d0718ca7a5002c0f48a099d1d345812a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: netfilter: nf_tables: do not allow SET_ID to refer to another table
